author: vors
body:
Test results

```
Describing Start-Process
usage: ping [-AaDdfnoQqRrv] [-b boundif] [-c count] [-G sweepmaxsize]
            [-g sweepminsize] [-h sweepincrsize] [-i wait] [−k trafficclass]
            [-l preload] [-M mask | time] [-m ttl] [-p pattern]
            [-S src_addr] [-s packetsize] [-t timeout][-W waittime] [-z tos]
            host
       ping [-AaDdfLnoQqRrv] [-b boundif] [-c count] [-I iface] [-i wait]
            [−k trafficclass] [-l preload] [-M mask | time] [-m ttl] [-p pattern] [-S src_addr]
            [-s packetsize] [-T ttl] [-t timeout] [-W waittime]
            [-z tos] mcast-group
 [-] Should process arguments without error 476ms
   Expected string length 4 but was 0. Strings differ at index 0.
   Expected: {ping}
   But was:  {}
   -----------^
   at line: 24 in /Users/vors/dev/PowerShell-Linux/test/powershell/Start-Process.Tests.ps1
   24:         $process.ProcessName | Should Be "ping"
usage: ping [-AaDdfnoQqRrv] [-b boundif] [-c count] [-G sweepmaxsize]
            [-g sweepminsize] [-h sweepincrsize] [-i wait] [−k trafficclass]

            [-s packetsize] [-T ttl] [-t timeout] [-W waittime]
            [-z tos] mcast-group

   Expected string length 4 but was 0. Strings differ at index 0.
   Expected: {ping}
   But was:  {}
   -----------^
   at line: 32 in /Users/vors/dev/PowerShell-Linux/test/powershell/Start-Process.Tests.ps1
   32:         $process.ProcessName | Should Be "ping"
usage: ping [-AaDdfnoQqRrv] [-b boundif] [-c count] [-G sweepmaxsize]
            [-g sweepminsize] [-h sweepincrsize] [-i wait] [−k trafficclass]

       ping [-AaDdfLnoQqRrv] [-b boundif] [-c count] [-I iface] [-i wait]

            [-z tos] mcast-group

   Expected string length 4 but was 0. Strings differ at index 0.
   Expected: {ping}
   But was:  {}
   -----------^
   at line: 40 in /Users/vors/dev/PowerShell-Linux/test/powershell/Start-Process.Tests.ps1
   40:         $process.ProcessName | Should Be "ping"
usage: ping [-AaDdfnoQqRrv] [-b boundif] [-c count] [-G sweepmaxsize]
            [-g sweepminsize] [-h sweepincrsize] [-i wait] [−k trafficclass]
            [-l preload] [-M mask | time] [-m ttl] [-p pattern]
            [-S src_addr] [-s packetsize] [-t timeout][-W waittime] [-z tos]

       ping [-AaDdfLnoQqRrv] [-b boundif] [-c count] [-I iface] [-i wait]

            [-z tos] mcast-group

usage: ping [-AaDdfnoQqRrv] [-b boundif] [-c count] [-G sweepmaxsize]
            [-g sweepminsize] [-h sweepincrsize] [-i wait] [−k trafficclass]

   Expected {0} to be greater than {0}
```

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: ~~I have a WIP to fix this test in PowerShell/psl-native#1.~~

title: Start-Process.Tests.ps1 failing on OS X due to the different ping parameters
